    Alumni

    The department, over the course of its rich and diverse history, is proud to have had wonderful faculty, students, and staff who have reached great heights in their respective disciplines. While this page lists a small collection of notable alumni and faculty who have been part of the department (coming soon), links to entire list(s) of students who have graduated from the various programs conducted by the department are provided below.

    Following is a list of notable alumni of the department who have also been recipients of the “Distinguished Alumnus/Alumna Award” from Indian Institute of Science.

    Alumnus/Alumna Position while receiving award Year of receiving award
    Prof. B. S. Murty Director, Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Hyderabad, India 2020
    Prof. Dipankar Banerjee Former Chief Controller of R&D at the Defence Research and Development Organisation (DRDO), New Delhi, India 2018
    Prof. S. Seetharaman Emeritus Professor, KTH Royal Institute of Technology, Sweden 2013
    Prof. Ramesh Ramamoorthy Plato Malozemoff Professor of Materials Science and Physics, University of California, Berkeley, USA 2012
    Prof. Subhash Mahajan Distinguished Professor and Special Advisor to the Chancellor, University of California, Davis, USA 2012
    Prof. Y. V. R. K. Prasad Technical Consultant, Processing maps.com, USA and Visiting Professor, City University of Hong Kong, China 2008
    Dr. Sanak Mishra Chief Executive Officer India Greenfield Projects, ArcelorMittal, New Delhi, India 2008
    Dr. Baldev Raj Hon. Member, International Committee on NDT, Distinguished Scientist & Director, IGCAR, Kalpakkam, Tamil Nadu 2007
    Prof. S. Ranganathan Hon. Professor, Materials Engineering, Indian Institute of Science and Visiting Professor at NIAS, Bangalore, India 2006
    Dr. Ashok K. Sinha Senior Vice President and General Manager, Applied Material Inc., USA 2005
    Prof. Brij M. Moudgil Director of the Engineering Research Center for Particle Science and Technology, University of Florida, USA 2003
    Prof. P. Ramachandra Rao Vice-Chancellor, Banaras Hindu University, Varanasi, India 2001
    Dr. R. R. Tummala Director, Packaging Research Center, Georgia Institute of Technology, Georgia, USA 1990
    Dr. P. Ramarao Former Secretary, Department of Science & Technology, Government of India 1990
    Prof. P. Somasundaran Former Chairman, Henry Krumb School of Mines, Columbia University, New York, USA 1989
    Prof. C. V. Sundaram National Institute of Advanced Studies, Bangalore, India 1985
    Prof. T. R. Anantharaman Former Director, Institute of Technology, Banaras Hindu University, Varanasi, India 1982
